resources.string: The helpful assistant for everyday life tasks
Do we really need to clutter our brains with multiple pin codes we should remember?Neverforget will do the job for us,so we can focus on more important things in life.
Use Tags and Save All Here
Its not only Card PINs,use RFID tag sticker on any item like your luggage,bick lock,literally anything,and keep the secret information in the app.
Just scan the card or the RFID tag via app,sure after unlocking it with your selected level of security and the secret will appear.Your data is encrypted and belopng only for you.
We make it easy for you to buy carefully selected top quality RFID Tags.
